name: Train Noir
description:
Upon accidentially boarding a mysterious train, a little girl finds herself on a ride through hell. Using her trusty smartphone as her only tool she tries to survive even though the odds are against her, as horrible monsters chase her thoughout the wagons. Can she make it, or does she succumb to insanity and join the trains crew.

Help A little girl survive her ride on a most horrendous train.

HOW TO PLAY

- Staying in the light keeps you sane. The more darkness you consume the more insane you go. 

- Turn on your phones flash light with "Q"

- If enemies grab you continuously press "E" to free yourself

- Hold "E" to pick up phone batteries

- Survive until the train reaches the next station

THEME

UNCONVENTIONAL TRAVEL


CONTROLS

E  - TO PICK UP
W, A, S, D - TO MOVE
